Title: Rescuing the Food
Description:
While awaiting your innards-bestowing return, I observed some fascinating activity below. A consistent train of kobyss are dragging the limp bodies of my kin from the lake's waters and westerly into their cavern.

My conclusion? Nerubians are being hunted and stored in the lake for consumption by these beasts.

It's not so much for research than it is for civic duty, but I would reward you might be able to save from their fate.
RewardText:
Your efforts are appreciated, but I will be rewarding these civic tasks at a... slightly lesser pay tier than your scientific ones.

Blame my stipend.
